thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 7 of 135
thread.title: Tiffany
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Tiffany

author: Tiffany
title: Tiffany
text: We just made our first big furniture purchase in our marriage. My husband is currently deployed, so I am even more grateful for the awesome service I received while shopping at HomeZone in Waco. I was greeted at the door but Steven, who help with our purchase. He was very patient, answered all my questions and very knowledgeable about the furniture he was selling. We ended up buying a sectional sofa that we are very pleased with and got an amazing price on it to boot! I would definitely refer any of my family and friends here for great service and even cheaper prices. I had done a lot of research of the bigger chains and Home Zone had the best prices by far!
